english.segment1: I see what eyes cannot see. and ears cannot hear. and brains cannot perceive. I see a spirit over me. that guides protects and keeps me. from some wrecks
english.segment2: I hear Jesus calling. I hear Jesus calling. I hear Jesus calling
english.segment3: I hear words that were said. over two thousand years ago. I hear the spirit when he's near. reminds me who I belong to
english.segment4: I hear Jesus calling. I hear Jesus calling. I hear Jesus calling
english.segment5: Softly and tenderly my Jesus is calling. calling for you and for me. I hear Jesus calling
